languages.text: [Обратиться к сопровождающим] "Раздайте им какое-нибудь угощение и проводите по домам. Думаю, минута лицезрения Лорд-капитана — уже достаточная честь для них".
[Address the chaperones] "Give them treats and escort them to their homes. I believe a minute of beholding the Lord Captain is a great enough honour for them."
languages.original_text: [Обратиться к сопровождающим] "Раздайте им какое-нибудь угощение и проводите по домам. Думаю, минута лицезрения Лорд-капитана — уже достаточная честь для них".

traits.locale_text: [Address the chaperones] "Give them treats and escort them to their homes. I believe a minute of beholding the Lord Captain is a big enough honor for them."

[Address the chaperones] "Give them treats and escort them to their homes. I believe a minute of beholding the Lord Captain is a great enough honour for them."

languages.text: [对陪护人员讲话]“给他们些吃的东西，送他们回去吧。我相信，能亲眼见到领主舰长本人，对他们来说已经是莫大的荣耀了。”
languages.original_text: [Address the chaperones] "Give them treats and escort them to their homes. I believe a minute of beholding the Lord Captain is a great enough honour for them."

traits.locale_text: [对陪护人员讲话]“给他们些吃的东西，送他们回去吧。我相信，能亲眼见到领主舰长本人，对他们来说已经是莫大的荣耀了。”

languages.text: [Dirigirte a los supervisores] «Que reciban algunos dulces y luego vuelvan a sus casas. Creo que un minuto contemplando a su L{mf|ord|ady} Capit{mf|án|ana} ya es suficiente honor para ellos».
languages.original_text: [Address the chaperones] "Give them treats and escort them to their homes. I believe a minute of beholding the Lord Captain is a great enough honour for them."

traits.locale_text: [Dirigirte a los supervisores] «Que reciban algunos dulces y luego vuelvan a sus casas. Creo que un minuto contemplando a su L{mf|ord|ady} Capit{mf|án|ana} ya es suficiente honor para ellos».

languages.text: [付添人に指示する]「ご馳走を与えて、家まで送り届けるのだ。ロード・キャプテンとまみえたひと時は、彼らにとって十分な名誉になっただろう」
languages.original_text: [Address the chaperones] "Give them treats and escort them to their homes. I believe a minute of beholding the Lord Captain is a great enough honour for them."

traits.locale_text: [付添人に指示する]「ご馳走を与えて、家まで送り届けるのだ。ロード・キャプテンとまみえたひと時は、彼らにとって十分な名誉になっただろう」

languages.text: [Die Aufsichtspersonen ansprechen] "Gebt ihnen Süßigkeiten und begleitet sie nach Hause. Ich denke, den Lord Captain eine Minute lang direkt vor sich zu haben, ist Ehre genug für sie."
languages.original_text: [Address the chaperones] "Give them treats and escort them to their homes. I believe a minute of beholding the Lord Captain is a great enough honour for them."

traits.locale_text: [Die Aufsichtspersonen ansprechen] "Gebt ihnen Süßigkeiten und begleitet sie nach Hause. Ich denke, den Lord Captain eine Minute lang direkt vor sich zu haben, ist Ehre genug für sie."

languages.text: [Vous adresser aux accompagnateurs] « Donnez-leur des friandises et reconduisez-les dans leurs quartiers. Je pense leur avoir fait assez d'honneur en me présentant devant eux. »
languages.original_text: [Address the chaperones] "Give them treats and escort them to their homes. I believe a minute of beholding the Lord Captain is a great enough honour for them."

traits.locale_text: [Vous adresser aux accompagnateurs] « Donnez-leur des friandises et reconduisez-les dans leurs quartiers. Je pense leur avoir fait assez d'honneur en me présentant devant eux. »

languages.text: [Refakatçilere hitap et] "Hediyelerini verdikten sonra gençleri evlerine uğurlayın. Lord Kaptan'la geçirdikleri sürenin, onlar için büyük bir onur olduğuna inanıyorum."
languages.original_text: [Address the chaperones] "Give them treats and escort them to their homes. I believe a minute of beholding the Lord Captain is a great enough honour for them."
